title: Password Strength Indicator Component
description: Create a PasswordStrengthMeter component that provides real-time visual feedback on password strength.
instructions:
Build a PasswordStrengthMeter component that:
1. Displays a visual strength bar that changes color (red/yellow/green)
2. Shows a checklist of password requirements with checkmarks
3. Calculates strength based on: length, uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special chars
4. Updates in real-time as the user types
5. Exports a boolean indicating if password meets minimum requirements

testCases.description: Returns strength 0 for empty or very weak passwords
Returns strength 4 for passwords meeting all requirements
Requirements checklist shows correct met/unmet status
testCases.expectedOutput: Each requirement correctly reflects password content

hints: Use regular expressions to test for character types: /[a-z]/, /[A-Z]/, /\d/, /[!@#$%^&*]/
The useMemo hook prevents recalculating strength on every render
Use useEffect to notify parent component when strength changes
commonMistakes: Not escaping special characters in regex patterns
Forgetting to handle the empty password case in the UI
